com.ephesoft.dcma.da.service

Interface SecurityUserService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SecurityUserServiceImpl

    public interface SecurityUserService
    Provides services for accessing and saving data related to security user.

    Service provided are:-

    • Fetch all user roles
    • Fetch all users
    • Whether the passed in user have super admin role
    • Save the user details in database
    Version:
    1.0 $LastChangedDate: 2015-04-14 12:53:03 +0530 (Tue, 14 Apr 2015) $
    $LastChangedRevision: 21604 $
    Author:
    Ephesoft created on 18-Nov-2013

      Gets all the users in the Ephesoft application.

      Checks if the passed user belongs to super-admin role or not.

    • Method Detail

      • getUserRoles

        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getUserRoles(java.lang.String userName)
        Gets the set of roles assigned to the passed user name.
        Parameters:
        userName - String user name of logged in user.
        Returns:
        Set<String> NULL if the user name passed is NULl or empty otherwise roles assigned to user.

      • getAllUser

        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getAllUser()
        Gets all the users in the Ephesoft application.
        Returns:
        set of all the users. Set<String>

      • isSuperAdmin

        boolean isSuperAdmin(java.lang.String userName)
        Checks if the passed user belongs to super-admin role or not.
        Parameters:
        userName - String user-name of logged in user.
        Returns:
        Boolean true/false true if user belongs to super admin role otherwise false.

      • saveAndUpdateUser

        boolean saveAndUpdateUser(java.lang.String userName,
                        java.lang.String groupName,
                        java.lang.Boolean isSuperAdmin)
        Save and update the user details in the database.
        Parameters:
        userName - String user name of the logged in user.
        groupName - String group name to which the user belongs to.
        isSuperAdmin - Boolean whether the logged in user is super admin or not.
        Returns:
        Boolean true/false true if the transaction is successful otherwise false.
